page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LISA
page.content: I get up at half seven and go down to get my breakfast.When I have finished I get dressed and pack my school books.I have my hair brushed and wait for Paula.At half past eight we set off for school and when the bell has gone we go in. Mr.Bartle calls the register.We have maths first. Mrs Carter takes us for one hour.Then we have a break.When the bell goes at 10.45 we go to P.E. After this it is dinner.I go home for dinner but you can stay for school dinner or packed lunch.The register is called again at 1.05. We go to sewing next where I am making an apron.Mrs Casson takes us for Humanities after this, and then comes hometime.When I get home I get dressed, do my homework and help my mum.I go out for an hour until my dad comes in.After tea I go to Karate.At 9 o'clock I go to bed.
